lead_paragraph: Having succeeded in ousting Benito Mussolini's Fascist regime and putting his country on the Allied side, we are having a difficult time of it occupying Italy. Air bombardment and the threat of more air bombardment, it is generally recognized, knocked Italy out of the war.
abstract: N Africa: Maj de Seversky on Allied air power role, Tunis
